I don't think some of you understand what an R5 is. It's just Russian sourced video. Obviously the audio comes from somewhere else. Usually a line version from the cinema for the hearing impaired. That's obviously not the case this time since the audio is pretty bad in places, but overall it's not that bad. All this is mentioned in the notes though.

I liked the movie, and it's the best romantic comedy about prison love I've ever seen. Also the only romantic comedy about prison love I've ever seen.
